title: Michael Woods climbs to Tour de France nirvana: ‘I dreamed of winning a stage’
content:
A former runner, Canadian blitzes Puy de Dôme to cap unconventional road to the top of the WorldTour: 'The window to win a stage was starting to close.'

Read the full article at Michael Woods climbs to Tour de France nirvana: ‘I dreamed of winning a stage’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
